org.upmc.electisim

Interface IAgentStrategy

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBestResponseAgentStrategy, IBetterResponseAgentStrategy, ILearningAgentStrategy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ARankingAgentStrategy, AStatefulAgentStrategy, OmniscientBestResponseStrategy

    public interface IAgentStrategy
    An interface for the agent strategies. In its most basic form, a strategy will need only one method, the executeVote(Agent, OmniscientKnowledgeDispenser, List, int) method, and will be provided with a OmniscientKnowledgeDispenser, but restrictions on the knowledge can be made using classes such as ARankingAgentStrategy or AStatefulAgentStrategy.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AgentVote executeVote(Agent agent, OmniscientKnowledgeDispenser dispenser, List<IElectable> candidateList, int committeeSize)
      Execute the vote of the agent and returns the vote

    • Method Detail

      • executeVote

        AgentVote executeVote(Agent agent,
                      OmniscientKnowledgeDispenser dispenser,
                      List<IElectable> candidateList,
                      int committeeSize)
        Execute the vote of the agent and returns the vote
        Parameters:
        agent - the agent emitting the vote
        dispenser - the knowledge dispenser to use of this voting process
        candidateList - the list of candidates
        committeeSize - the size of the desired committee
        Returns:
